mapper.update:
update inform
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where inform_id = #{informId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update inform set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emali_code = #{emaliCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_emali = #{isEmali,jdbcType=TINYINT}, phone_code = #{phoneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inform_message = #{informMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merchandiser = #{merchandiser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where inform_id = #{informId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
